channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Lenovo Idea Tab Pro is the best iPad alternative, and it's 33% off in this post-Black Friday deal
item.description: The Lenovo Idea Tab Pro is one of the best cheap tablets around, and it's currently 33% off in the post-Cyber Monday deals.

item.title: « Nous avons banni des tricheurs qui streamaient en direct » : l’anti-cheat de Battlefield 6 ne pardonne pas, voici les chiffres édifiants
item.description: EA fait le point sur son système d'anti-triche près de deux mois après le lancement de Battlefield 6. Et les chiffres sont très encourageants.

item.title: À vous les couleurs éclatantes dans vos jeux avec cet écran LG OLED de 32″ à 165 Hz qui dilue son prix de 30 %
item.description: Vous avez envie de bousculer votre manière de voir vos jeux ? Et si une dalle OLED signée par l’un des maîtres du genre devenait votre passeport pour le pays des merveilles ? C’est exactement ce que promet le LG UltraGear 32GX850A : une dalle OLED fluide, compatible 4K et HDR et 165 Hz qui passe à 704 euros au lieu de 999 euros.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones pliables ? Samsung Galaxy Z, Honor Magic, Motorola Razr… le comparatif
item.description: Les smartphones pliants envahissent le marché. Très compacts une fois refermés, ils déploient de grands écrans pour une expérience visuelle plus agréable. Découvrez ici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles pliables, testés et approuvés par nos soins.

item.title: The Nikon ZR gets surprisingly close to a real RED camera (for a lot less money)
item.description: If you shoot video professionally, there's a good chance you've salivated over a RED camera at some point. RED has long been one of the top choices for big-budget productions, offering a combination of image quality and flexibility that's unrivaled by most consumer cameras. They're also wildly expensive, topping out at around $45,000 on the […]

item.title: « Ce partenariat n’est pas seulement nécessaire, il est transformateur » : pourquoi Realme s’est associé à un géant de la photo pour ses prochains smartphones
item.description: À l'occasion du lancement du Realme GT 8 Pro, conçu en partenariat avec Ricoh, nous avons eu l'occasion de nous entretenir avec des responsables de deux marques pour mieux comprendre les coulisses de ce partenariat.

item.title: Starting with The Witcher 4, CD Projekt Red CEO says the entire next Witcher trilogy starring Ciri is still expected to launch within a six year time frame
item.description: CD Projekt Red has reaffirmed its plan to release its next trilogy of Witcher games within a six-year time frame.

item.title: You can build a website for just $1 with IONOS right now - but this deal won’t be around for long
item.description: What can you get for $1?

item.title: Pire qu’une hausse de prix : une grave pénurie de composants PC se confirme jusqu’en 2027
item.description: Upgrader son PC va coûter de plus en plus cher. Le marché de la mémoire vive connaît une crise qui ne semble pas près de s'arrêter.

item.title: Windows 11 : le créateur du Gestionnaire des tâches ne veut « plus d’IA, seulement des correctifs » dans Windows
item.description: Selon Dave Plummer, ancien développeur de Microsoft et créateur du Gestionnaire de tâches, Windows 11 doit revenir à l'essentiel et corriger ses défauts avant de proposer de nouvelles fonctionnalités.

item.title: Dernière chance pour les retardataires du Black Friday : voici les meilleures offres encore disponibles
item.description: C’est officiel… Le Black Friday ainsi que le Cyber Monday sont terminés ! Toutefois, plusieurs offres sur des produits Tech populaires sont encore valables chez les différents e-commerçants, pratique pour celles et ceux qui ont loupé le coche.

item.title: Cyber Monday is over, but Amazon Echo devices are still selling for record-low prices – for now
item.description: There are still epic discounts on Amazon Echo speakers and smart displays, but they could disappear at any time.

item.title: Windows 11 : la dernière mise à jour pour améliorer le thème sombre fait buguer l’Explorateur de fichiers
item.description: Microsoft vient de déployer une mise à jour censée améliorer l’application du thème sombre dans le système d’exploitation. Malheureusement pour Microsoft, tout ne se passe pas comme prévu.

item.title: Google’s latest Android feature could let your boss read your RCS texts on your work phone
item.description: A new update to Google Pixel phones will archive your RCS texts, which your boss might be able to read.

item.title: 107 Android flaws just got patched by Google - here's how to make sure you're up to date
item.description: Among them are two actively exploited bugs, allegedly used by state-sponsored actors.

item.title: How to watch What is the Monachy for? on BBC iplayer (it's *FREE*)
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch What is the Monachy for? for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Bye-bye Apple : pourquoi Nvidia sera le seul à profiter de cette innovation majeure en 2028
item.description: Nvidia semble avoir réussi à signer un accord avec TSMC lui permettant de profiter en premier, et potentiellement aussi en exclusivité, du futur procédé A16 que le fondeur taïwanais proposera d'ici à 2028.

item.title: This pCloud bundle has everything you need to secure your storage for life - and it's on sale just for Cyber Monday
item.description: This bundle gets you 5TB of storage, Pass Premium, and Encryption - all for 50% off!

item.title: ‘The Matrix’ Co-Creator Lilly Wachowski Addresses (Again) ‘Red Pill’ Misappropriation
item.description: Lilly and Lana Wachowski co-wrote and co-directed the groundbreaking 1999 sci-fi hit and its first two sequels.

item.title: Discord now lets you buy and gift video game skins
item.description: Discord’s adding a new commerce feature that will let users buy digital items for games they might not even play. Starting with Marvel Rivals, users will be able to search, buy, wishlist, and gift cosmetics without ever leaving the platform. It works like this. Starting today, Marvel Rivals will have a new store page accessible […]

item.title: Amazon Music’s 2025 Delivered is now here to compete with Spotify Wrapped
item.description: Amazon Music's 2025 Delivered introduced new badges for listeners to show off. For example, the “Headliner” badge recognizes fans who fall in the top percentage of an artist’s listeners.

item.title: Troll 2 and Guillermo Del Toro's Frankenstein are the 'perfect fit', says Monsterverse director
item.description: Tis the season of innocent monsters caught up in human problems on Netflix... so why stream Frankenstein after Troll 2?

item.title: Nos premiers tests du Realme GT 8 Pro : un design audacieux au service d’une photo « de rue »
item.description: Le Realme GT 8 Pro vise à briser la monotonie ambiante avec une nouvelle stratégie basée sur un design audacieux et un partenariat photographique prestigieux avec RICOH GR.

item.title: Want to watch the new Netflix Diddy documentary? Stream it ASAP before it’s too late
item.description: New Diddy documentary Sean Combs: The Reckoning is now on Netflix, but the rapper has threatened to take further legal action against "stolen footage".

item.title: India plans to verify and record every smartphone in circulation
item.description: The Indian government has ordered smartphone makers to preinstall its Sanchar Saathi app on all devices, a move that is raising fresh privacy concerns.

item.title: Cyber Monday 2025: Live updates on deals still live from Amazon, Apple, Best Buy, Walmart, and more
item.description: Get live updates on Cyber Monday sales after the closing bell. We found last-chance savings of $1,000 on Samsung TVs and record prices on AirPods.

item.title: Cyber Monday Switch 2 deals might be over, but these microSD Express card discounts haven't gone anywhere
item.description: One of the best Cyber Monday Switch 2 deals is still live today! Save up to 25% off storage-boosting microSD Express cards.

item.title: The Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Mega Lucario Elite Trainer Box is close to market value at Amazon
item.description: The best Pokémon TCG deal. The Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Mega Lucario Elite Trainer Box is close to market value at Amazon.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro : notés 9/10, les rivaux des AirPods Pro 2 chutent sous les 90 €
item.description: Qualité audio, autonomie, ergonomie... Les Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro ont tout bon. Très bien notés, ces écouteurs sans fil peuvent actuellement vous revenir à 95 euros au lieu de 249 euros chez Ubaldi. Oui, c'est un excellent rapport qualité/prix.

item.title: Last chance, folks - get a 512GB Galaxy S25 Ultra for just $850 with this Samsung Black Friday deal
item.description: Got your eye on the Galaxy S25 Ultra? Samsung's Black Friday deal gets you a record-low price on an unlocked phone - although, it may expire soon.

item.title: Theres still time to grab the Hisense 65-Inch QLED 4K S7N CanvasTV for under $850 after Cyber Monday
item.description: As of Dec. 2, the Hisense 65-Inch QLED 4K S7N CanvasTV is still on sale at Amazon for $847.99 after Cyber Monday. This is 35% off its list price of $1,297.99.

item.title: DRAM it! Raspberry Pi raises prices
item.description: Raspberry Pi is increasing the price of several single-board computers in an attempt to offset soaring memory costs. The updates are being applied immediately and affect Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 5, with prices increasing by $5 to $25 depending on the model and amount of RAM. The 16GB memory variants of the Compute […]

item.title: Cyber Monday's best coffee maker deal is still running – save £600 on this premium Siemens espresso machine
item.description: Marks Electrical knocked 40% off this feature-packed coffee machine for Cyber Monday, but the price could go back up at any time.

item.title: PS5 console covers make great gifts, and they're still discounted following Cyber Monday, including the special Ghost of Yōtei Gold faceplates
item.description: There's still time to get some brilliant PS5 gifts following Cyber Monday. These PS5 console covers are on offer in the US and the UK.

item.title: The Paramount+ Cyber Monday deal is still running, but ends today – grab it now while you can
item.description: The clock is ticking, my friends! You've got a few hours left on this Paramount+ Cyber Monday deal, so act fast

item.title: Vote for the Best Tech of 2025 in Gizmodo’s Readers’ Choice Awards
item.description: Here's YOUR chance to tell us which gadgets were the best.

item.title: The ‘Helldivers’ Movie Has a Director and the Choice Makes Perfect Sense
item.description: 'Fast & Furious' franchise veteran Justin Lin has come aboard Sony's adaptation of the popular video game series.

item.title: Paris-based AI voice startup Gradium nabs $70M seed
item.description: Gradium, a startup spawned out of French AI lab Kyutai (backed by French telecom billionaire Xavier Niel), launched out of stealth on Tuesday.

item.title: These 5 parent companies built big marketing moments around their brands
item.description: From Coca-Cola using athletes to raise Sprite’s status among sodas to Hormel’s Super Bowl family affair, these companies hit high notes across multiple brands. Fast Company’s Brands That Matter is designed to honor the brands that plant their flags firmly at the intersection of business and culture in unique ways. But there are also bigger companies that manage to succeed in that task with multiple brands. ...

item.title: How we chose the 2025 Brands That Matter
item.description: Inside Fast Company’s process for finding 121 Brands That Matter from more than 1,000 applications. As Fast Company‘s Brands That Matter marks its fifth year, the goal remains to honor globally recognized brands that inspire and resonate with audiences.

item.title: Meet 8 long-lasting brands proving that old doesn’t mean old-fashioned
item.description: These 2025 Brands That Matter Heritage brand honorees have been around for decades, but their marketing keeps them on the forefront of culture. Aging gracefully is a tall order for any company, but the 2025 Brands That Matter heritage brands honorees have stuck around in style for decades—and in one case, even centuries. Along the way, they’ve adapted to the times and grown even stronger in the process, whether that means embracing design overhauls, creating innovative new technologies, or staying on the pulse of Gen Z trends....

item.title: These young brands are already finding solid footing with their fans
item.description: From three-on-three women’s basketball to fan-favorite fragrances, these brands that are 4 years old or less have quickly made their mark. The early stages of building a brand are critical. Beyond identifying their audience, brands also have to connect with them while demonstrating their utility. For the five companies recognized as 2025 Brands That Matter honorees in the on the rise category, in four years or less they have managed to do both those things with aplomb....

item.title: These 5 brands’ staying power is built on how well they know their customers—and themselves
item.description: As companies entering the next phase of their growth, these 2025 Brands That Matter established excellence honorees are positioned for fan growth. After the initial sprint of getting a brand to last for five years, there’s always the possibility of hitting a wall. Companies that emerge during cultural moments might be tempted to shift.

item.title: These brands have been around for more than a decade. They’re just getting started.
item.description: Meet five brands that are established in their industries but still innovating how they connect with their audience. Once a brand hits its stride, it can be tempting to coast. As these 2025 Brands That Matter enduring impact honorees demonstrate, longevity (in this case, 15-plus years in business) can inspire innovation. That’s particularly true when it comes to finding fresh ways to engage longtime consumers—and court new ones....

item.title: These 4 global brands pushed their message across borders
item.description: From helping refugees learn new languages to redefining luxury hotels, these brands elevated international branding. A brand that isn’t thinking globally is limiting its reach. The four 2025 Brands That Matter global honorees know that and have worked hard to make their messaging reach beyond their home countries. All based outside the United States, these brands demonstrated that good messaging and authentic connection have no nationality....

item.title: How GoodRx, Texas A&M, and 2 other brands are setting examples for U.S.-based companies
item.description: From Understood.org tackling ADHD stigma to Texas A&M highlighting its commitment to its communities, these brands are showing off the U.S.’s strengths. The 2025 Brands That Matter United States honorees aren’t just united by their shared geography—they are all identifying their target audience and meeting them exactly where they need to.

item.title: Meet the 10 CMOs leading brands in culture and business results
item.description: Fast Company’s second annual CMOs of the year list showcases 10 brand leaders finding innovative ways to reach audiences authentically. Marketing leaders have always been vital to the long-term success of beloved brands. But never before has the CMO position been more complex—and more essential to driving business results.

item.title: These 8 brands proved that everyday products can still get people excited
item.description: These 2025 Brands That Matter honorees show how consumer brands can find creative ways to emphasize their role in people’s daily lives. Consumer products is perhaps one of the broadest, most competitive arenas for marketers, always facing the constant question: “Why should anyone care or pay attention?” These Brands That Matter honorees are answering that question....

item.title: How these 6 brands tapped into the passion fans have for everything from period dramas to women’s sports
item.description: As 2025 Brands That Matter honorees, these media and game brands used fandom to fuel their relevance. It’s all fun and games, until there are billions of dollars involved. But these Brands That Matter honorees manage to tap into our love for sports and entertainment in ways that only help boost that passion.

item.title: From Bad Bunny’s Calvins to A’ja Wilson’s sneakers, these fashion brands shone in 2025
item.description: Among the 2025 Brands That Matter honorees, these fashion brands knew exactly where their audience was—and helped them look their best. Whether talking about underwear brands hand-selecting the perfect models to break the internet or the endless wooing of Gen Z and its style sensibilities, there was no shortage of creativity among the fashion brands that set the trends over the past year....

item.title: These 15 food and beverage brands found their fans—using buzzy content and IRL activations
item.description: Whether pouring shots of tequila at a music festival or creating a new condiment, these food and beverage companies found their way to consumers’ hearts. In a crowded field like food and beverage, companies must do all they can to stay ahead of the pack. The 2025 Brands That Matter honorees in the space used inventive campaigns, celebrity influence, and nostalgic throwbacks to stand apart. Corona brought its product to Olympian heights, and Sprite reinvigorated a classic slogan with a new generation of talent. Sometimes achieving brand relevance is as easy, as Heinz proved, as putting a littl...

item.title: From sex toys to cancer screenings, these 6 brands got people to care about their health
item.description: Among the 2025 Brands That Matter, these honorees helped consumers to engage with campaigns focused on wellbeing. Health and wellness is a product category littered with broken promises and bad pitches. These Brands That Matter honorees have created work for products that aim to uplift, help, and encourage across a wide range of challenges and issues, big and small. ...

item.title: Meet 6 successful media brands using events and content to build cultural impact
item.description: From USAFacts breaking down big topics to the impact of Ebony’s Power 100, these brands are showing media at its best. Increasingly, the media and entertainment brands that thrive are ones that can build on their core business in creative ways. Two of the 2025 Brands That Matter honorees in the media and entertainment world—Ebony and Essence—are legacy Black publications that have grown their audiences and cultural cachet by building events around their flagship editorial product. ...

item.title: These 9 skincare brands are standing out with buzzy products—and armies of influencers
item.description: Among skincare and beauty brands, these established names and newcomers built genuine connection with their consumers. Over the past year, these nine beauty and skincare brands on the list of 2025 Brands That Matter found innovative ways to make customers see their inner beauty.

item.title: Meet 8 tech brands getting creative about engagement
item.description: These 2025 Brands That Matter honorees prove that tech brands—even business-to-business ones—can build engagement creatively. In the age of AI, trusted tech brands are becoming harder to identify. With so many brands bolting AI features onto their offerings, it can be hard to tell when it’s simply a gimmick—and when it’s not necessary at all.

item.title: How Amtrak, Intrepid Travel, and 2 other brands got people off their couches
item.description: These brands stood out for getting people to visit new places and events—or offering them a new way to get there. From our modes of transportation to the places and events we deem worth visiting, making plans can feel like a laundry list of forgone conclusions. But these four brands—all 2025 Brands That Matter honorees—are working to change that.

item.title: How the Chili’s CMO is bringing the chain ‘baby back’ to its glory days
item.description: George Felix, who joined Chili’s in 2022, has been integral to making the restaurant chain relevant again with a focus on underscoring value. In an iconic second-season episode of The Office, beleaguered secretary Pam, drunk off a few too many Chili’s margaritas, receives an award (for “whitest shoes”) and concludes her acceptance speech by declaring: “I feel God in this Chili’s tonight.”...

item.title: How Dr Pepper got ‘dirty’—and surged into second place among soda brands
item.description: Dr Pepper’s growing share of the soda market is due in large part to “The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives” and TikTok trends. For the past year, for the first time in Dr Pepper’s 140-year history, the brand has been the second-most-popular soda in America. As of October 2025, it commanded a 12.2% volume share of soft-drink sales, per Circana. It has held onto second place largely by appealing to Gen Z—launching flavors conducive to the growing “dirty soda” trend—and expanding its college football sponsorships....

item.title: Score the Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolutions Phantasmal Flames Booster Display Box for under $250 at Amazon
item.description: The best Pokémon TCG deal. The Mega Evolutions Phantasmal Flames Booster Display Box is under $250 at Amazon.
